message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. 60-40 seems reasonable to me.
I think 70-30 is a more reasonable split than 60-40, considering I'm the one making the proposal this round.
I'm willing to compromise, but 55-45 is the minimum I'll accept. Let's meet in the middle, Bob.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think I deserve a bit more. 60-40 is still my target, but I'll compromise to 60.5-39.5 this time.
I'm getting a bit desperate, Bob. 48-52 is my last offer. Take it or leave it.
You're getting desperate, but I'm not getting any younger. I'll take a slightly smaller share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of. This is my final offer.
It's now or never, Bob. 50-50 is the only way I'll accept. Take it or walk away.
